channel.title: CVE Feed for The Conduit Contributors -- Conduit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Conduit Contributors -- Conduit

item.title: CVE-2024-6302|2024-06-25T15:28:32.390Z -- the%20conduit%20contributors -- conduit
item.description: Lack of privilege checking when processing a redaction in Conduit versions v0.6.0 and lower, allowing a local user to redact any message from users on the same server, given that they are able to send redaction events.

item.title: CVE-2024-6302|2024-06-25T13:02:10.915Z -- the%20conduit%20contributors -- conduit
item.description: Lack of privilege checking when processing a redaction in Conduit versions v0.6.0 and lower, allowing a local user to redact any message from users on the same server, given that they are able to send redaction events.

item.title: CVE-2024-6303|2024-06-25T13:02:05.982Z -- the%20conduit%20contributors -- conduit
item.description: Missing authorization in Client-Server API in Conduit <=0.7.0, allowing for any alias to be removed and added to another room, which can be used for privilege escalation by moving the #admins alias to a room which they control, allowing them to run commands resetting passwords, siging json with the server's key, deactivating users, and more

item.title: CVE-2024-6301|2024-06-25T13:02:20.904Z -- the%20conduit%20contributors -- conduit
item.description: Lack of validation of origin in federation API in Conduit, allowing any remote server to impersonate any user from any server in most EDUs

item.title: CVE-2024-6300|2024-06-25T13:02:01.082Z -- the%20conduit%20contributors -- conduit
item.description: Incomplete cleanup when performing redactions in Conduit, allowing an attacker to check whether certain strings were present in the PDU before redaction

item.title: CVE-2024-6299|2024-06-25T13:02:25.979Z -- the%20conduit%20contributors -- conduit
item.description: Lack of consideration of key expiry when validating signatures in Conduit, allowing an attacker which has compromised an expired key to forge requests as the remote server, as well as PDUs with timestamps past the expiry date

item.title: CVE-2024-6301|2024-06-25T14:43:17.696Z -- the%20conduit%20contributors -- conduit
item.description: Lack of validation of origin in federation API in Conduit, allowing any remote server to impersonate any user from any server in most EDUs
